info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 1:31AM CDT until August 12 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Pike County in west central Illinois... Southeastern Adams County in west central Illinois... East central Ralls County in northeastern Missouri... Central Pike County in northeastern Missouri... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 131 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fall Creek to near Hannibal to Center, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bowling Green, Pittsfield, Louisiana, Barry, Griggsville, Payson, Pleasant Hill, Atlas, Clarksville, Beverly, Frankford, Pike, Tarrants, Spencerburg, Kingston, Independence, Hull, Martinsburg, Richfield, and Perry. This includes Interstate 72 between exits 10 and 35. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
